txt.en: Raining stalactites upon the middle of the bridge!
Protect the barricades at the end of the island bridge and stop the enemy from damaging Gamling's ballista.

Gamling has fallen back to man the ballista near the centre of the Glittering Caves. He can fire the ballista into the opposite wall to cause stalactites to fall upon the centre bridge. Use the signaling flags near the bridges to indicate to Gamling to drop stalactites on the near, centre, or far end of the bridge.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Point Loss</rgb>
- Every 25% health of the ballista

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Point Loss</rgb>
- Barricades destroyed
- Signaling flag destroyed

<rgb=#FF0000>Minor Point Loss</rgb>
- Supply crate destroyed
Dropping stalactites upon the closest enemies!
Bringing down stalactites on the far end of the bridge!
Protect the barricades between the bridges and the ballista.
<rgb=#FF0000>The Signaling Flags must not be destroyed ([placeholder]/3)</rgb>
I will man the ballista above to rain stalactites upon them! Use a signaling flag below to signal when I should fire!
